alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN LYCOMING AND WESTERN SULLIVAN COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EDT... At 759 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Canton to near Montoursville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ralston, Kettle Creek Gorge, Trout Run, Lincoln Falls, Barbours, Shunk, Buttonwood, Loyalsockville, Cogan Station, Forksville, Eagles Mere and Hillsgrove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central Pennsylvania.
